message:
Subject: Enquiry About Admissions and Open Days

Dear Jess,

I am interested in learning more about Bassett House School for my daughter, who will be starting Reception next September. Could you please let me know if there are any upcoming open days or opportunities to visit the school? I would also appreciate any information about the admissions process and key dates I should be aware of.

Thank you for your help.

Best regards,  
Sophie Martin
reply: Dear Sophie, Thank you for your interest in Bassett House School for your daughter. We would be delighted to welcome you to our school. The best way to learn more about us is to visit in person. We offer individual tours, allowing you to explore our school, meet our Head and members of our Senior Leadership Team, and see our classrooms and facilities in action. Due to high demand, individual appointments are limited, and priority is given to families who are registered and looking for entry within the next two academic years. If you are looking for a place in Nursery or Reception in September 2025, please do get in touch to arrange a private tour with our Head. Additionally, we run individual and small group tours for families every week. You can fill out our enquiry form and our Admissions team will be in touch to find a suitable time for your visit. We also invite you to attend a Stay & Play session in our newly renovated Bassett House Nursery, which is a wonderful opportunity for you and your child to get to know our school in a fun way. You can find more information and register for the Stay & Play sessions here. If you have any further questions about the admissions process or key dates, please do not hesitate to reach out. Warm regards, Jess Ottley-Wood Director of Admissions Bassett House School

message:
My son is currently in Year 2 at another prep school, and we’re thinking about moving him to Bassett House next term. Could you let me know what the admissions process involves and whether it’s too late to apply?

Warm [redacted]
reply:
Dear [redacted],

Thank you for reaching out regarding your son’s potential move to Bassett House School. We would be delighted to welcome him into our community.

The admissions process for Year 2 involves a few key steps. First, I recommend that you complete our registration form, which allows us to note your interest and keep you updated on available places. Once registered, we can arrange for your child to attend a taster day, where he can experience our school environment and we can assess his fit within our curriculum and community.

As for your question about timing, it is not too late to apply for a place in Year 2 for the upcoming term. I encourage you to contact our Admissions Team directly to check on availability for your child’s year group.

For a more detailed overview of the admissions journey, please visit our Admissions page. Additionally, if you would like to learn more about our school in person, I invite you to explore our Visit Us page to arrange a private tour or attend one of our Stay & Play sessions.

Please feel free to reach out if you have any further questions or need assistance with the registration process.

Warm regards,

Jess Ottley-Woodd
Director of Admissions
Bassett House School

reply:
Re: Arrange a School Tour

Dear Lisa,

Thank you for confirming your visit to More House for this Friday. We are looking forward to welcoming you and your daughter, Sophie, to our school.

As you step through our doors, you will immediately experience our small school environment, where every student is truly known and nurtured. During your visit, you may see the focus and engagement in a dynamic science lesson or perhaps the collaborative problem-solving in a maths lesson. Beyond the core curriculum, you may hear the energy of drama rehearsals, see art studios buzzing with creativity, or find our students throwing themselves into all sorts of clubs and activities.

We would also like to invite you to our Open Evening on Wednesday, 17 September 2025, from 6:00pm to 7:30pm, and our Open Morning on Friday, 10 October 2025, from 9:30am to 11:00am. These events will provide you with a broader view of our school and the opportunity to meet with our Head and other staff members.

Upon registration, Sophie will be invited to attend a Taster Day at More House, where she will meet with our Head and/or Deputy Head for an informal interview and complete two assessments in Maths and English.

If you have any further queries, please do not hesitate to contact us. We are here to guide you through this process and make it as smooth as possible.

On behalf of everyone at More House, we look forward to welcoming you soon.

Kind regards,

The Admissions Team More House School
